text:
A U S
ROBERT F. SCHENKKAN
Director
ROBERT D. SQUIER
Television Program Director
September 30, 1963
Marion Corwell
Dearborn Board of Education
5757 Neckel Avenue
Dearborn 1, Michigan
Dear Marion:
Thank you for your note of September 26th in reference
to the meeting of the Public Relations Committee of
the National Association of Educational Broadcasters,
at 12:15 P.M. on Wednesday, November 20th in Milwaukee.
You may count on my attendance at that meeting.
Robert D . Squifer
Television Program Director
RDS/hd
